description: Create, update, delete snapshot groups for NetApp E-series storage arrays

repo_pct.description: The size of the repository in relation to the size of the base volume

name.description: The name to give the snapshot group

rollback_priority.description: The importance of the rollback operation.

api_password.description: The password to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

state.description: Whether to ensure the group is present or absent.

storage_pool_name.description: The name of the storage pool on which to allocate the repository volume.

api_username.description: The username to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

api_url.description: The url to the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

base_volume_name.description: The name of the base volume or thin volume to use as the base for the new snapshot group.

full_policy.description: The behavior on when the data repository becomes full.

warning_threshold.description: The repository utilization warning threshold, as a percentage of the repository volume capacity.
